title: Brilliant
comment: Love the customisation and the interface is really easy to use. Also ad-free 😁
I love this app but it will not let me change the background. I keep getting "a custom background image is not defined; the default will be used instead" :(

Please email for support or ask on the Ravelry forum and I will see what can be done to fix this.

Edt: It's now fixed.

title: Perfect app
comment: What's not to love about an ad-free app that perfectly fulfils its purpose? An absolute must-have for any crafter.

title: Adorable and useful.
comment: I need separate memory card partition for craft apps. Hope it's still there when I get back.
Nice app but is there a way to add a pic of the finished article for each project?

Thanks for your review.

There isn't currently such a feature, but it could perhaps be added. I'm not sure of the best place to put it, but if you have any suggestions then please feel free to email me.

title: Cindy Stevens
comment: I just downloaded this app and it looks to be exactly what I was looking for. I had an old plastic counter that worked wonders but a new puppy took care of it!  I tried several different apps before landing on this one and it is the only one as versatile as my old plastic counter. I have only one item for which I would suggest a change and it is minor. Being older I would like to see the Notes in a larger font to make it easier to read on the pattern page. Like I said a minor detail in an awesome app.
Thanks! I'll see if I can sort out the font problem as soon as I get a chance.

title: Best counter so far!
comment: Love it!

title: Awesome app
comment: Love that I can store so many projects so that I can refer back when I am doing another project off the same pattern... no ads and customizable!!
Love this app.
I really like this app. I can usually find a way to set it up for what I need.

title: This is wonderful!
comment: I put the full pattern in here. No more need to tote around paper instructions. A big help.

title: Absolutely the best counter!
comment: I have other counters installed...this one is by far the best.
Love it, I only wish I could sync between devices.
Thanks for the review. I plan to add syncing when I can (probably via Dropbox), but time is short at the moment.

title: Great App!!
comment: Does exactly what it says it does and more. Keeps multiple projects organized. So useful.

title: The Best!
comment: I was using another counter but got tired of all the ads flashing at me.  This is ad free, but also keeps track of multiple counts for multiple projects!  I love, too, thst it uses my own project/count name when referencing (eg. "Sleeve dec will reset when it reaches 6) helping me keep track of how close I am to finishing a count, as well as where I'm at within that count.
Wouldn't let me add any projects.

That sounds very strange, and it's not a problem I've encountered. If you would not mind emailing me with the details then I would be happy to investigate.

Edit: I think I've found the cause of this perceived problem; projects were being added but it can be hard to find them. This is fixed from 2.3.5 onwards.

title: A wonderful knitting app!
comment: I've had this on my phone for months but was afraid to use it because I thought it'd probably be too complicated for me to figure out. WRONG! It's amazingly easy to use and user friendly and I love not having to have a piece of paper and pen constantly with me to keep track of my repeats and rounds! I really thank you for developing this wonder of a knitting app, and for making it free, no ads, and no intrusions into my privacy! Great job! :)

title: Link problem, but great overall
comment: Aside from an annoying pop-up warning about my links (I have no links, so this is a bug), this is an easy-to-user, very handy counter.

If you wouldn't mind getting in touch by email then I could take a look at this and see if I can sort the problem out. 

Edit: This bug has now been fixed.

title: So easy
comment: Very customizable. Easy for a non-technical knitter to use.
Great counter!

title: Does what I need and more
comment: I can track multiple projects at the same time.  Each project can have each part tracked separately.  I found that very useful when I was knitting a hat that had a rim, body, and crown to keep track of all in one project.  This app works much better than the scraps of paper I used in the past.

title: Works great
comment: I love how it can track multiple rows, repeats, increases, etc. for multiple projects, and how out saves my spot automatically. The counter linking functionality is so helpful. I set it up to give me a reminder on increase rows. Just perfect.

title: Awesome!
comment: I really appreciate having all of the different options to customize and keep track of my projects while counting rows.  It truly is free and ad free!

title: Bee count knitting co
comment: Just downloaded!

title: So angry
comment: Reset every counter when the app updated!

That shouldn't happen, and I don't know why it did. If you would not mind e-mailing me to let me know the details of your device and when you installed/last updated BeeCount that would be helpful. Thanks!

title: Easy way to track knitting and crochet projects
comment: Makes it easy to track knitting and crochet projects. Love that I can keep track of what row I'm on.

title: Bee count
comment: Does everything I want,  just wish I could increase the size of the note font. And now I can,  thank you!
Thanks for your review. A font size increase for the notes will be coming soon in an update.

title: I love this app!
comment: This is one of my most used apps! I'm not sure how I managed to knit before I had it. It's very simple and easy to use, and that's why I love it. I think it's the most used non-communication app on my phone.
The most useful counter a knitter could ever want

title: Best knitting counter I know
comment: I've stopped knitting for a while and when I got back on it, I was surprised to see the many updates this app has since gotten. Now, it's really got everything I need - including alarms! Those are the best new feature and something that I have always missed.

title: Nice little app, good people too
comment: Keeping my review current. This is still my favorite stitch counting program. I can keep track of complicated lace patterns and all the repeats. With the new text section, I can note the pattern and not have refer back to my pattern. Works great on my new Nexus 7. Now also on my Samsung Galaxy S3. I had a problem with the buttons on my Acer tablet running Honeycomb. I emailed the developer, he borrowed a tablet, saw my problem and fixed it! Love this program.

title: No more paper counting!
comment: Exactly what I have been looking for. Thanks for fixing the deleting linked counts problem. I recommend this to all knitters I know!

title: Easy and clear
comment: Great app. I have it loaded must of the time. Essential

title: Love this app
comment: I downloaded it on my tab, and now on my phone. I love being able to access my progress on my multiple projects. Nice!

title: I use this constantly!
comment: UPDATE: After the updates,  this app is hard to use. The opening page doesn't fit the screen,  so you have to page down to open projects. Size also effects the projects page.  Save etc buttons are hard to see.                  This is a great app. You can track multiple projects at the same time. Also you can add as many items inside the project as you want (I have yet to hit a limit). This is a definite must have app for all knitters. Thanks for this app.
Extra buttons have been added at the top of the screen, which should hopefully address this problem.

title: Love it
comment: Simple, practical, custom. Love

title: Does it right
comment: Does everything you want it to easily, intuitively, and quickly. Not fussy.

title: Evidently you can improve perfection!!
comment: I love that you can customize each counter to fit the project. So, just got the update, and found that now I can customize the background...just when I thought the app couldn't get any better!

title: Thank you
comment: Flexible and easy to use. It's obviously made by someone who knits. Thank you for making it not just free, but ad-free. As far as strictly counting apps go, this is the best on the market and one of the first things I install on a new device.

title: Worth the learning curve!
comment: Does exactly what I need it to. Love the flexibility to set it up how I like.  It has taken some experimentation to learn how to use (which could just be my age!) but the more I learn, the more I like it. I also like that it's a work in progress--it gets better with each update.

title: Great little app
comment: It's really handy. Wouldn't knit lace without it

title: Can't knit without it!
comment: Love this app and use it for most of my knitting projects. I especially love being able to link the counts when doing increasing and decreasing sections :-)

title: Great support!
comment: I recently had some trouble with the linking feature. I emailed the developer and they were amazingly fast at getting back to me and figuring out the problem. I needed a good android stitch counter as I am leaving my iphone and this app is perfect! Does exactly what I need and it's fairly simple to learn how to use.

title: Love it!
comment: I love this app! The only reason it's not getting 5 stars is that background pic. Sometimes, it's hard to read the small print because of the pic. I would like the option to change it or even choose between it and a solid color. I have no idea how hard that would be to code, though, so maybe I'm asking for a lot.  Anyway, the app works flawlessly on my HTC One X. Great app!  Edit: Here's your 5th star! Thanks for such a quick response and action to my request. Love it!
Thanks for your feedback. This sounds like a good idea, so I'll try to get around to it as soon as I can.

title: Love it!
comment: I've tried a few other counters, but this is my favorite.

title: Handy
comment: I wish it handled multiple simultaneous repeats a little better.
If you wouldn't mind e-mailing me to explain the problem I'll see what I can do about it.

title: Brilliant
comment: The first knitting counter app I ever tried - and the only one I'll ever need! Really useful.

title: Very useful application!
comment: It has replaced my notebook that I used to keep pattern notes in.

title: Fantastic app
comment: Absolutely love it - made tackling my first non-scarf project very, very easy! There are a lot of  counting apps out there, but being able to add text, have multiple projects and multiple counters within a project are all essential little things most other counters don't have (or claim to have but don't work!)   Thanks for sharing for Android programming training exercise!

title: Love it
comment: I've been using Bee Counter for about a year, and it's been a great tool. Easy to use, very easy to set up and keep track of projects. I haven't used the reminder alerts (I think these are new?), but am going to check them out.

title: Stable; Robust; Responsive developer
comment: Neat and simple and exactly what it should be.

title: Never been able to use it
comment: Crashes everytime I try to use it.
The cause of this particular problem has been tracked down and fixed.

title: Black background is boring.
comment: Well, the option to turn off backgrounds is good, but it's a bit boring to look at the black screen.  It would be much more fun if we could have an option to choose our own backgrounds,  ex. personal photo from gallery... Anyway thanks for your work, thanks for helping us to knit easier :)
Knitting. Designer

title: Awesome App!
comment: I use this app all the time.  Can't live without it.
Love this app!

title: Perfect
comment: Just what I need to keep track of multiple counts in a project

title: Absolutely brilliant
comment: I cant remember if I paid for this app, but if I didn't, I would. Its the best counting app I've tried

title: Great little app!
comment: A great customizable app to keep track of multiple counts for knitting and crochet. Simple, but effective.

title: Sooooooooooooooo cool!
comment: Love love love this app!!!!

title: Best multi-project multi-count app I've seen
comment: I wanted an app that would let me have multiple counts going at once, so I could keep track of, for example, multiple cable patterns, increases or decreases, overall item rows... and perhaps an additional count for the other project lurking on the needles.  This one does this, and goes one better.  I can create multiple projects, and for each one get a blank page on which I can create a stack of counters, name them names that mean something to me, zero them out, increment or decrement...  I hear there is a feature for linking counters to one another, which would be nice when counting repeats of a multi-row motif, but I have not dug into this yet.  I've only had it for a week-ish, but so far I absolutely love it.

title: Excellent
comment: Finally a stitch counter that does what I want without being complicated.

title: Brilliant!  Just what I was looking for!
comment: This is a great app for simply keeping count of your rows, but what makes it better is that you can also link counts so that you can count increases ie, inc 1 st each end of 4th row, 10 times..  Have tried other apps for this and they haven't linked.   As yet haven't needed it for anything else so for me it's 5 star.

title: Great.
comment: Simple to use, helped me in two projects already. Easier than finding a pen and more comfortable than row counters sitting on the needles.

title: Helpful!
comment: Great little app. Love that you can set multiple counters for a single project.

title: Great app
comment: Have to type out each row individually for my project, but good app for keeping track! developer quick to respond to questions! Thank you!

title: Brilliant!
comment: Love this app! Such a great tool. Love it. Thanks so much for making it!

title: Great app
comment: Very nice and easy to use

title: Excellent app!
comment: I love how simple this is to use. I always have multiple projects going, and this little app is great at helping me keep track. Only thing I would like to see is the ability to change the title of a project and maybe add a note to a count.

title: excellent countet
comment: nice to have multiple projects going each with unique

title: LOVE!
comment: What a fantastic app! Manage multiple projects with multiple stitch counts! I would pay for an upgrade that allows you to set a "row alert", e.g., a notification when you reach row 12 that you should change to size 2 needles. Fabulous app! I use it constantly. Thank you for making it!
I've finally managed to put this feature in - sorry for the enormous delay. The app is still free. ;-)

title: Very helpful
comment: One star down because of lack of explanation how to use it. Obviously I'm not intuitive enough....
Very useful

title: Excellent
comment: Does exactly what I needed - makes it easier to knit on the bus to work as no need for pen and paper.

title: Exactly what I need
comment: This app allows you to link multiple counters which is perfect for more complicated patterns like sweaters with several different cable styles knit simultaneously.

title: Bee count
comment: Love it!
Fatastic!!

title: Love it
comment: Fabulous app great to be able to link counts using for many projects not just knitting. Force close issue resolved in a few hours

title: Very Happy!
comment: Saw a mention of this app on Ravelry's Android group board and I'm very happy that I did. It's a great app, easy to use but full featured - I especially like the ability to have multiple counters for a single project, this is VERY handy for things like 2 socks at the same time. Thanks for a great app.

title: easy to use
comment: Does what it says.  Very easy to use.  Amust have for any knitter on the go.

title: beecount
comment: Love this app! It's just what I've been looking for. I have all my projects on here. I love that I can put several counts on one project eg rows, pattern repeats, and that I can count up or down on the same screen without having to go to the menu to reset. Great job guys:)

title: Excellent free app
comment: Easy to input a variety of information on your projects and super easy to use.

title: Excellent knitting app
comment: Good, The flexible knitting counter; space to put any name you want to a county, space for multiple projects. Free, and ad-free!
